Articles.Content:
Sorry if you just saw this in another thread, I accidentally posted it in the wrong location.

This is my first time sharing an aircraft. Any comments are welcome and tips/constructive criticism will be appreciated. Also, excuse me for the horrible editing, but I just made it really quick and I'm not the best editor.

Deployable Electric Propeller Aircraft Mk 01 - DEPA-01

Mods:

B9 Aerospace (I think the air breaks)

D12 Battletech (Canopy)

Infernal Robotics & IR Model Rework (foldable parts)

Firespitter (propeller, tail, landing gear)

Quantum Struts

Craft file: http://goo.gl/FSWbaJ

Eventually I want to drop it from another aircraft, as shown below

Edited July 2, 2014 by GodsPrototype
Two great things- the aircraft and ACDC's "If You Want Blood You Got It".
I really like the way it folds up mid-flight and does a nose-dive. Really neat!
This is really cool. If there was a folding prop combustion engine in Firespitter, you could call it a dieselpunk deployable fighter craft.
